ingredients.ingredient: Broccoli florets (enough to fill up bottom of casserole dish)
cooked chicken, cubed  (I use 3 chicken breasts)

directions.process: Preheat oven to 425. While oven is heating, rinse, dry, and cut broccoli. Arrange broccoli in 9x13 casserole dish.
Cube the chicken, and cook until brown. Then spread chicken over broccoli.
In medium mixing bowl, mix soup and milk, until smooth. Pour over broccoli and chicken.

In a microwaveable bowl, melt butter. Once butter is melted, add bread crumbs and mix thoroughly. If there’s still melted  butter noticeable, add more bread crumbs. Spread bread crumb mix over cheese.
Bake for 25 minutes or until its bubbly. Take out of the oven and let it cool for 5-10 minutes. Enjoy with rice and rolls!
